messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: It is time for change. If you have had enough of the same old political parties, now is the time to vote UKIP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year extra into the NHS by scrapping the £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: UKIP will pour £3 billion a year extra into the NHS by scrapping the £55 million a day EU membership fee.
issues.economy: UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
issues.health: UKIP will pour £3 billion a year extra into the NHS by scrapping the £55 million a day EU membership fee.
issues.immigration: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.

housing.content: UKIP will SCRAP the bedroom tax

leaflet.personalStatement: Say Yes to a free NHS that looks after those most in need. Say Yes to politicians who care about their communities.
